name: Sniper Shadow Strike: VR Shooting Game
summary: Stay in the shadows and take the shot to become the ultimate VR sniper!  Choose from 6 powerful rifles with 4 unique skins each. Customize your look with masks, paints, and shirts. Play across Career, Challenge, and Zombie survival modes. Test your precision, upgrade your gear, and prove you’re the deadliest sharpshooter in Sniper Shadow Strike: VR Shooting Game.
